page.title: 10Burton Latimer High Streeet
page.content: This text refers to the data collected on the street survey which is given on page 9. More women were questioned as men were at work and in most households women tend to do the shopping. The age group 31-60 was most widely represented.Under 30's would be at work or school and the elderly do not get out so many times. The majority of people visited the High Street daily to shop. Daily needs were bread, milk & papers. For a wider range of goods people go to Kettering. People on business were going to the bank and the most common other reason given was meeting children from school. The vast majority of people walked to the High Street indicating that they live locally. Few people who didn't live in Burton Latimer were found in the High Street.
